mapper.insert: insert into D_CAJA_DET_TBL (UID_ACTIVIDAD, UID_DIARIO_CAJA, LINEA, FECHA, CARGO, ABONO, CONCEPTO, DOCUMENTO, CODMEDPAG, ID_DOCUMENTO, CODCONCEPTO_MOV, ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO, UID_TRANSACCION_DET, CODDIVISA, TIPO_DE_CAMBIO, USUARIO) values (#{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashJournalUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashJournalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{input,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{output,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{concept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesDocCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentMethodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesDocUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movConceptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payTransactionLineUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT TIPO_DOCUMENTO, COUNT(DISTINCT ID_DOCUMENTO) AS DOCUMENTOS, SUM(TOTAL) AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT 'SALES' AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO, ID_DOCUMENTO, SUM(CARGO-ABONO) AS TOTAL FROM D_CAJA_DET_TBL WHERE UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UID_DIARIO_CAJA = #{cashJournalUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID_DOCUMENTO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ID_DOCUMENTO HAVING SUM(CARGO-ABONO) >= 0 UNION SELECT 'RETURNS' AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO, ID_DOCUMENTO, SUM(CARGO-ABONO) AS TOTAL FROM D_CAJA_DET_TBL WHERE UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UID_DIARIO_CAJA = #{cashJournalUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID_DOCUMENTO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ID_DOCUMENTO HAVING SUM(CARGO-ABONO) < 0 UNION SELECT 'MOV_INPUT' AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO, '0' AS ID_DOCUMENTO, SUM(CARGO) AS TOTAL FROM D_CAJA_DET_TBL WHERE UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UID_DIARIO_CAJA = #{cashJournalUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID_DOCUMENTO IS NULL AND CARGO <> 0 UNION SELECT 'MOV_OUTPUT' AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO, '0' AS ID_DOCUMENTO, SUM(ABONO) AS TOTAL FROM D_CAJA_DET_TBL WHERE UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UID_DIARIO_CAJA = #{cashJournalUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID_DOCUMENTO IS NULL AND ABONO <> 0 ) SUMA GROUP BY TIPO_DOCUMENTO
